title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail: Explore the Trail Network by Region
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Explore the Trail Network by Region              Exploring the Potomac Heritage Trail Network         Start your biking journey along the Great Allegheny Passage NPS Photo / Copenhaver  There are many different ways to enjoy the evolving PHT network. These pages suggest ways to explore the network by region and type of activity.  And if you have an idea or suggestion for travelling the length the PHT corridor, please send a note by clicking on "Contact Us."      By Region:  C&O Canal Towpath Corridor (Maryland) Great Allegheny Passage (Pennsylvania) Laurel Highlands Hiking Trail (Pennsylvania) Northern Virginia Southern Maryland Virginia's Northern Neck Washington, DC Western Maryland         By Activity:  Backpacking Bicycling Birding Camping Civil War Children & Family Activities Cross-Country Skiing Hiking Historic Sites History Museum/Visitor Centers Paddling Walking Wildlife
